text: Syria competed at the 1984 Summer Olympics in Los Angeles, United States. Joseph Atiyeh won the nation's first ever Olympic medal. ==Medalists== {| class="wikitable" |- !Medal !Name !Sport !Event |- | || Joseph Atiyeh || Wrestling || Men's Freestyle Heavyweight (100 kg) |}
